name: Legenda Venerabilium Virorum Aymonis et Vermondi
description: Legenda Venerabilium Virorum Aymonis et Vermondi; Attributed to Anovelo da Imbonate (Italian (Lombard), active about 1400); Milan, Lombardia, Italy; about 1400; Tempera colors, gold leaf, and ink on parchment bound between pasteboard covered with green parchment; Leaf: 25.6 × 18.4 cm (10 1/16 × 7 1/4 in.); Ms. 26; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
title: Legenda Venerabilium Virorum Aymonis et Vermondi
medium: Tempera colors, gold leaf, and ink on parchment bound between pasteboard covered with green parchment
